about.label: About Me
about.brief: A lad capable to turn caffeine into codes.
about.description:
Hello, I'm Kanak! 
 A Software Developer specializing in Android Application development. Experienced with all stages of the development cycle for dynamic projects. Well-versed in numerous programming languages including Kotlin, Core Java etc."

items.title: Android Developer
items.description: Working as an Android application developer with 1+ years of experience. Eager to support in modernizing world-class products and deliver an incredible user experience.
Being a Computer Science Engineer, I gained vast amount of knowledge even in software and IT industry as well.

items.academy: Haryana State Board of Technical Education
items.description: During this time frame, I have learned basic concepts in better practical way. It gave me wide array of opportunity to work on lot of things.
It was a place where I spent my childhood with new mates while gaining broaden knowledge in last decades.

items.label: FindFit People
items.brief: Find professional coaches nearby to you and easily hire your favorite one as your coach

items.label: Toor
items.brief: Toor app is a great way to make your travel plans stress-free. Request a trip on demand.

items.label: Stay Home
items.brief: Courier any product to your favorite one from anywhere .'STAY HOME' we are here for you!

items.label: Mokabook
items.brief: Online shopping with Mokabook is very easy as you get to shop from the comfort of your home and get products delivered at your doorstep

items.label: Bigi Driver
items.brief: Driver application to deliver orders to the customers. Driver can choose for which type of delivery they want to do i.e Food , Groxery and Taxi

items.label: Bigi Customer
items.brief: Customer Application with features of placing order (Food,Groxery and Taxi), Live Track the order and Accept order from the Bigi Driver.

items.label: Day Fresh
items.brief: Shop from a vast range of products including farm-fresh fruits and vegetables, groceries & more at the best prices.

items.label: Renadia
items.brief: Through the app, you can book at home services - from beauty & wellness for women and men

items.label: Genie
items.brief: Through the app, you can book at home services - from doctor & wellness, to home repairs and maintenance services, such as carpenter, electrician and plumber.

items.label: Product Driver
items.brief: Turn your spare time into money with the new Driver app – built in partnership with drivers to bring you the tools you need to succeed.Help move people and things where they need to go. Drive whenever you want – no offices, no bosses. Wherever you want to go, we want you to enjoy the journey and the destination.

items.label: Product Driver
items.brief: Turn your spare time into money with the new Driver app – built in partnership with drivers to bring you the tools you need to succeed.Help move people and things where they need to go. Drive whenever you want – no offices, no bosses. Wherever you want to go, we want you to enjoy the journey and the destination.

items.label: Tehbola
items.brief: Through the application user can order variety of drinks from anywhere online.

items.label: Mazat
items.brief: Find your favourite local restaurants, as well as top chains like Dominos, KFC, Burger King, Pizza Hut, Mc Donald’s, Subway and more, then Order food, groceries, and other essentials online.
